LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.0.label: awful den
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.0.description: The den is barley better than sleeping outside.
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.1.label: dull den
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.1.description: The den is a uncomfortable place.
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.2.label: mediocre den
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.2.description: I don't care for our den, but it's a place to sleep.
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.3.label: decent den
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.3.description: The den is alright, if you ignore the smell and snoring.
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.4.label: slightly impressive den
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.4.description: The den is acceptable, I could care less about it.
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.5.label: impressive den
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.5.description: The den is an inviting place. It smells like home.
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.6.label: very impressive den
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.6.description: The den is very impressive, I can rest easy there.
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.7.label: extremely impressive den
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.7.description: The den is extremely impressive, worthy of our clan.
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive den
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.8.description: The den is unbelievably impressive, the pride of our clan.
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.9.label: spectacular den
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBarracks.stages.9.description: The den is beyond description, a symbol of our clan's strength.
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.0.label: terrible burrow
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.0.description: My burrow is a terrible, my grunts echo off the empty the walls.
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.3.label: uncomfortable burrow
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.3.description: My burrow is an uncomfortable, lonely place.
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.4.label: unpleasant burrow
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.4.description: My burrow is unpleasant. I wish I had company.
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.5.label: bearable burrow
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.5.description: My burrow is bearable. Its amenity distract from the emptiness.
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.6.label: comfortable burrow
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.6.description: My burrow is very comfortable. I don't mind spending time in it.
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.7.label: very comfortable burrow
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.7.description: My burrow is very comfortable. I deserve such luxuries!
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.8.label: unbelievably comfortable burrow
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.8.description: My burrow is very comfortable. I deserve such luxuries!
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.9.label: Kingly burrow
LanguageData.OrcSleptInBedroom.stages.9.description: My burrow is fit for an elven fop. Worthy of an orc of my grander.
LanguageData.OrcNeedBeauty.stages.0.label: filthy environment
LanguageData.OrcNeedBeauty.stages.0.description: This place is getting a bit slimy.
LanguageData.OrcNeedBeauty.stages.1.label: ugly environment
LanguageData.OrcNeedBeauty.stages.1.description: This place looks as ugly as me.
LanguageData.OrcNeedBeauty.stages.2.label: mundane environment
LanguageData.OrcNeedBeauty.stages.2.description: This place is isn't much to look at.
LanguageData.OrcNeedBeauty.stages.3.label: adequate environment
LanguageData.OrcNeedBeauty.stages.3.description: I could care less about this place.
LanguageData.OrcNeedBeauty.stages.4.label: nice environment
LanguageData.OrcNeedBeauty.stages.4.description: This place is looks nice, not that I care.
LanguageData.OrcNeedBeauty.stages.5.label: gaudy environment
LanguageData.OrcNeedBeauty.stages.5.description: This place is looks like an elven palace, its a bit showy.
